title: Juvale Assorted Floral Thank You Blank Cards with Envelopes (4x6 In, 48 Pack)
features: Floral Thank You Cards: This value set comes with all the essentials you need to send warm wishes to your coworkers, friends, and family members; these are great for weddings, baby showers, birthdays, and more

Personalize Your Message: The greeting cards are blank on the inside and provide you with a sizeable amount of writing space to send thoughtful messages; you’ll find plenty of space to write a personalized message; tuck a meaningful photo print in with your message and you’ll certainly warm a loved one’s heart

6 Assorted Designs: Find the perfect thank you card for your upcoming baby shower, wedding, and housewarming party; these boxed greeting cards include 6 assorted designs that feature intricate detailing, gold foil accents, and decorative thank you text printed on the front cover
Reliable Quality: Our decorative greeting cards measure 4x6 inches and are made from premium white-colored cardstock paper; the smooth surface allows you to use pens, markers, or pencils with ease
What's Included: Our bulk greeting cards set contains 48 floral cards with 48 corresponding white envelopes
description: Send a heartfelt message to your loved ones with this set of 48 cute greeting cards with corresponding white envelopes. Our DIY greeting cards assortment features 6 watercolor designs with festive thank you text printed on the front. Each greeting card measures 4x6 inches with a blank interior to ensure you have more than enough space to send personalized wishes to friends and family. With 6 designs to choose from, you’ll find the perfect greeting card to express your gratitude and well wishes to your loved ones.
